long_class_specifier.description_string: Interface for heat pump plant controller

description.description_string: Plant configuration parameters
Parameter record for controller
Number of heat pumps
Type of controller
Number of air handling units served by the plant
Number of terminal units (zone equipment) served by the plant
Set to true for plants with primary HW flow sensor

expression.simple_expression: cfg.have_heaWat and (if [object Object] then true else have_senVHeaWatPri_select)

description.description_string: Set to true for plants with primary HW flow sensor
Set to true for plants with secondary HW flow sensor
Set to true for plants with primary CHW flow sensor

expression.simple_expression: cfg.have_chiWat and (if [object Object] then true else have_senVChiWatPri_select)

description.description_string: Set to true for plants with primary CHW flow sensor
Set to true for plants with secondary CHW flow sensor
Set to true for plants with primary HW return temperature sensor

expression.simple_expression: cfg.have_heaWat and (if cfg.have_hrc or not have_senTHeaWatSecRet then true else have_senTHeaWatPriRet_select)

description.description_string: Set to true for plants with primary HW return temperature sensor
Set to true for plants with primary CHW return temperature sensor

expression.simple_expression: cfg.have_chiWat and (if cfg.have_hrc or not have_senTChiWatSecRet then true else have_senTChiWatPriRet_select)
